document_data.name: Holman Frostfeather
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|4}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 3: The Bron's Deputies}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Holman Frostfeather''' was a law enforcement officer in the town of [[Voonlar]] sometime during the term of Bron [[Buorstag Hlammythyl]], ''i.e.'', from about [[1355 DR]] until at least [[1372 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Holman found the humor in most situations, usually lightening the mood with a joke or being dismissive of seriousness. He was the most lenient and kind-hearted of the deputies.
document_data.Possessions: He wore [[chain mail]] and carried a [[shield]],{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|3}}
document_data.History: Holman escaped from a [[thieves guild]] in a faraway city and jumped at the chance to be on the right side of the law when the Bron offered him a job. Sometime after moving to Voonlar, he received training from the [[Zhentilar]].
